head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ALTMAN, DAVID R.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ALTMAN, DAVID R.

block.p: ALTMAN-David R. On August 30, 2000 in New York City. David loved life. Beyond all others, he made the everyday extraordinary. He found joy where others could not see it. He turned strangers into friends and friends into family. And then there is Floria. His wife, his life, of over 53 years. Floria and David. David and Floria. One and the same. Emily & Dara had the matchless chance to be his children, with Floria, the loves of his life. He made his sons-inlaw, Michael Lennon and Michael Kahan, his sons. He cherished his grandchild Asher. He was dearest brother-in-law, more like brother, to Melvin Lasky. Brother-in-law to Joyce Lasky Reed. Incomparable uncle and great-uncle to Rosalind, Richard, Lionel, Samantha, Vivienne, Rachel, Adam, Oliver, Amanda, Nicholas, Sasha & Carla. David walked among us and left very large footprints. We are fortunate to have walked with him. In memory of David R. Altman and in honor of Dr. David R. Schwartz for the benefit of the Medical Intensive Care Unit contributions may be made to Tisch Hospital, NYU Medical Center, Development Office, in care of Myra Biblowit, 550 First Ave, New York, NY 10016. Services Tuesday, September 5, 1:15 PM at, The Riverside, 76th Street and Amsterdam Ave.

ALTMAN-David. The Producer Circle Co. mourns the loss of our cherished friend David, a warm and wise and talented gentleman. Our deepest condolences to his family, his dear wife Floria V. Lasky, and their daughters Emily and Dara. Martin Richards, Maryanne Dittmann, Sam Crothers, Monique Bell, Dan Gallagher, Michael Milton

ALTMAN-David R. It is with great sorrow that we say goodby to the husband of our partner Floria V. Lasky. His visits to our office were always a pleasure. We shall miss him. Fitelson, Lasky, Aslan & Couture
ALTMAN-David. Dear Floria, Emily and Dara-All who knew David know the depths of your loss. We grieve and hold you in our thoughts and prayers. Charlotte, Jill and Maura Spiegel
